channel.title: Game Design on Nithesh Javvaji

item.title: StudyCrafter
item.description: Studycrafter Workspace -- StudyCrafter is a playful platform where you can create, play and share research projects to study human behavior. Since 2017, I’ve been contributing to the research and development of this platform as well as efforts on back-end development and database design for this project.
